title: Submit Work for Rotovision Book - FONT
content:
For those who haven't seen my blog post, we've extended the deadline for Typophiles and other great designers to submit work to a new Rotovision book project on classic fonts in contemporary design.

Details are at [http://typophile.com/node/50885](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417045614/http:/typophile.com/node/50885 "http://typophile.com/node/50885")
author: tamye
